description: women, men and children on city street with street lamp in foreground left, with black dog standing next to it; two girls in LRC, seen from back; father, mother and little boy dressed as soldier with toy gun at center right; woman pushing wheelbarrow filled with flowers at center left; couple at left with small white dog; carriage behind couple; buildings with many French flags flying at right; sketchy scenes in margin, with men, women, children, soldiers, carriages, dogs, Chinese lanterns
marks:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

on back, LLC, in the print: [F Buhot pinx sc]; bottm center
title: La Fête Nationale au Boulevard de Clichy
